subject: PDPHRM
title: Communication for Pharmacy
description: Students will have received strong grounding in key communication concepts during the first two academic semesters in the pharmacy program.  This course requires that the student apply these concepts to their co-op work term and assess their own performance.  Students are required to reflect on the development of their communication skills and formulate objectives to further develop their communication skills. [Note: Course will be graded on a CR/NCR basis. Offered: W, S, F]
